sourcesContent:
<template>
<v-app >
  <v-container >
    <v-row class="justify-center">
    <v-card max-width="500" >
      <v-row justify="center">
          <v-card-title >
            Register
          </v-card-title>
      </v-row>

    <v-form v-model="valid" ref="form">
    <v-container >
      <v-row justify="center">
        <v-col
          cols="12"
          md="11"
          
        >
          <v-text-field
            v-model="firstname"
            :rules="nameRules"
            :counter="10"
            label="First name"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>
        <v-col
          cols="12"
          md="11"
        >
          <v-text-field
            v-model="lastname"
            :rules="lastnameRules"
            :counter="15"
            label="Last name"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>

        <v-col
          cols="12"
          md="11"
        >
          <v-text-field
            v-model="email"
            :rules="emailRules"
            label="E-mail"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-col>

        <v-col col="12" md="11">
          <v-select v-model="sectionSelected" :items="section" :rules="[v => !!v || 'Section is required']"
            label="Section">

          </v-select>

        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-form>
  <v-card-actions>
    <v-row justify="end">
      <v-col md="4" justify="end">
         <v-btn rounded color="secondary" @click="submit" >Submit</v-btn>
      </v-col>
       
      
    </v-row>
  </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</v-app>
  
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'


export default {
    data: () => ({
      endpoint :"http://localhost:5000/register",
      valid: false,
      firstname: '',
      lastname: '',
      nameRules: [
        v => !!v || 'Name is required',
        v => v.length <= 10 || 'Name must be less than 10 characters',
      ],
      lastnameRules:[
        v => !!v || 'Lastname is required',
        v => v.length <= 20 || 'Name must be less than 20 characters',
      ],
      email: '',
      emailRules: [
        v => !!v || 'E-mail is required',
        v => /.+@.+/.test(v) || 'E-mail must be valid',
      ],
      sectionSelected:null,
      section:[
        '1','2','3'
      ]
    }),

    methods: {
       async submit(){

        if(this.$refs.form.validate()){
          await axios.post(this.endpoint,{
            name:this.firstname,
            lastname:this.lastname,
            email: this.email,
            section:this.sectionSelected
          }).then(function(response){
            console.log(response);
          }).catch(function(error){
            console.log(error);
          })

        }else{
          console.log("invalid")
        }
      }
    },
  }
</script>

<style >
    
</style>
